purpose.summary: This file is an IMS Program Specification Block (PSB) generation control statement file that defines PSBPAUTL for assembler language programs. It specifies a single database PCB named PAUTLPCB for accessing the DBPAUTP0 database with PROCOPT=L (load/unload processing option) and a key length of 14. The PCB defines two sensitive segments: root segment PAUTSUM0 (PARENT=0) and child segment PAUTDTL1 under parent PAUTSUM0.

open_questions.question: What is the business purpose of the DBPAUTP0 database and its segments PAUTSUM0/PAUTDTL1?
open_questions.context: No descriptive comments or names indicate business function beyond IMS DL/I access definitions.
open_questions.suggestion: Review the associated DBD (Database Definition) for DBPAUTP0 or application programs using this PSB.

open_questions.question: Which application programs use this PSB (PSBPAUTL)?
open_questions.context: PSB defines access for unnamed application programs; no references in this file.
open_questions.suggestion: Search for PSBNAME=PSBPAUTL in PCB masks of COBOL/PL/I/PSB using programs.
